channel.title: Compiling Error?
channel.description:
[code]PacketManager.java:28: error: non-static variable this cannot be referenced from a static context PACKET[1] = new Test(); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Sorry if this is the wrong section.
What does the Compiler Error mean?
